wikipedia_page.main: Russell Bradley (born 28 March 1966) is an English former footballer and highly rated left footed centre back who played in the Football League for Nottingham Forest, Hereford United, Halifax Town, Scunthorpe United and Hartlepool United.He played for Kidderminster Harriers  and Dudley Town before joining Nottingham Forest. After a serious injury he left Forest and signed for Hereford Utd having made a few appearances for Forest's first team in the League Cup and Simod Cup. His Professional career finished in 2002 aged 36, after playing for Hednesford Town  in the National League.
